name: The Beasties: Hello World
description:
★★ FREE! for a limited time regular price $2.99 ★★
Swoooooosh! With a glance you see a tiny creature run across the room. Did you see that? Why that’s a Beastie! Grab it!

What are The Beasties? Well, they are tiny creatures that go unnoticed in our world, but now you have a chance to learn all about these special, smart creatures.

Each and every type of Beastie has a unique personality that will determine which of its needs are most important. If players don’t keep up with their Beasties needs, the Beastie won’t survive for long. Care for, train, train, play and customize your Beasties with your own signature style in The Beasties: Hello World!

What will you discover with The Beasties: Hello World?
• A whimsical 3D world at your fingertips
• Interactive Beasties that come to life on your screen
• Teach your Beastie to speak in your native language using your mic
• Dress Up your Beastie and their home
• Beasties that learn tricks the more you play with it
• Reinforce good or bad behavior with by petting or poking your Beastie
• Yes! You can have more than one Beastie! Collect them All!

Still reading? Your Beastie is waiting! Tap to Download and Play.
